name: Comet rocket - GDKO 2023 - Round 2
description:
space is usually a cold silent place, apart from spaceship engines blasting through the emptiness.  But for one spaceman, that silence was interrupted by a distress call from a far away galaxy.  they rushed to get the the call but when they approached, the ships computer shut down and he crashed. when the astronaut came too he awoke in a strange galaxy full of tiny planets and strange creatures. after using spare parts to fashion a sort of comet rocket(TM), he must now explore and find any hint of who left the distress call,  and talking t the aliens in the area.

Controls:

A/D - Player Left / Right

W/Space - Jump
Arrow Keys - Planet Movement
E - Interact With NPCS, Collect Audio Logs, and Interreact with machines.

Assets: 

All Assets were made by me accept for the music, some sound effects, and the dialogue audio
